name: Shadow Quotes
description:
Do you know who said the most famous quotes in the world?

This game contains many interesting shadow-pictures and quotes from:

Movies

Characters

History

Authors

Athletes

Celebrities

Others...

Your task is to solve them.

Different and useful helps are avaible for you.

When finish the game, will know who told the most famous sentences in the world.

You won't be bored and have fun!
